full_summary:
**Heavy Lift Helicopter Services - British Columbia, Canada**
================================================================

**Procurement Number:** WS4418188618
**Publication Date:** April 17, 2024
**Closing Date:** May 2, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT
**Amendment Number:** 1

**Synopsis:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) to solicit bids for Heavy Lift Helicopter Services to support the Canadian Coast Guard's (CCG) installation of Marine Communications and Traffic Services (MCTS) equipment on the British Columbia coast.

**Service Requirements:**

The CCG requires a helicopter service provider to transport personnel and equipment to support the installation of MCTS equipment on various island locations in British Columbia. The helicopter services must be able to accommodate heavy lifts, up to 20,000 pounds, with a radius of at least 50 nautical miles from the departure airport.

**Scope of Work:**

The RFP includes the following scope of work:

* Provision of helicopter services to transport personnel and equipment to support the installation of MCTS equipment on various island locations in British Columbia;
* Heavy lift capabilities, up to 20,000 pounds;
* Radius of at least 50 nautical miles from the departure airport;
* Capability to operate in Marine Atmospheric Weather conditions (Type IV).

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Price
* Technical capability to meet the outlined requirements
* Safety record
* Past experience in similar projects

**Trade Agreements:**

The RFP is open to bidders who are able to meet the requirements of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
